ocean.question: I wave but have no hands. I have creatures, but no farms. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am very big and made of water.
⛵ Boats sail on me.
🐳 Fish and whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I'm slow, I might race a hare, but I don't know. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I move very slowly.
🥬 Some kinds eat plants.
🏠 I carry my house on my back.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and can squirt ink. I live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I use my arms to grab things.
🎨 I can change color to hide.
🌊 I am a sea animal.

ocean.question: I'm a type of fish with a very flat body. I can sting with my tail. What am I?

hints.text: 🥏 I am shaped like a disk.
🌿 I sometimes bury myself in the sand.
🤕 My sting can hurt.

ocean.question: I am a very large mammal that lives in the ocean, and I sing songs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I breathe air, but live in the sea.
🎶 I communicate with sounds.
🌊 I am bigger than a dolphin.

ocean.question: I am a home to many sea creatures, but I am not a house. I'm built by tiny animals. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am made of calcium carbonate.
🐠 Many colourful fish live near me.
☀️ I need sunlight to grow.

ocean.question: I’m a fish that can inflate its body with water to become round and spiky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐡 I become much bigger when scared.
☠️ I can be poisonous if eaten.
🟡 I am often yellow or brown.

ocean.question: I'm a predator known for my powerful jaws and many rows of sharp teeth, swimming silently in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I have a fin on my back.
🩸 I have a reputation for being scary, but most kinds are harmless to humans.
🐟 I am a type of fish.

ocean.question: I'm a current like a river in the ocean, carrying warm water far away. What am I?

hints.text: 🌡️ I affect the climate of nearby lands.
➡️ I move water in a specific direction.
🗺️ I am found in the Atlantic Ocean.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean, a dark and mysterious trench. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 Sunlight cannot reach me.
🧭 I am found in the western Pacific Ocean.
🌊 The pressure here is extremely high.

plant.question: I have roots, but no feet. I have leaves, but no hands. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I need sunlight to grow.
💧 I drink water from the ground.
🌳 I can be big or small.

plant.question: I am a seed's home. I help plants grow big and strong. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 Worms like to live in me.
🖐️ You can dig me with a shovel.
🪴 Plants grow out of me

plant.question: I am a part of a plant that is often colorful and smells nice. Bees love me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌺 I can be red, yellow, or pink.
🐝 Pollen can be found on me.
🌷 I turn into fruit.

plant.question: I am green and grow on trees. I make food for the tree using sunlight. What am I?

hints.text: 🍃 I fall off the tree in Autumn.
🖐️ I am flat and often have veins.
☀️ I use the sun to make food.

plant.question: I am a vegetable that makes you cry when you cut me. What am I?

hints.text: 🧅 I am round and have layers.
🍳 People cook me in soups and stews.
😥 My smell can make you tear up.

plant.question: I am a tall plant with a thick, woody stem. I live for many years. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 Birds like to build nests in me.
🪵 My trunk can be used to make paper.
🍂 I can grow very, very tall.

plant.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh. What am I?

hints.text: 🥝 I am small and oval-shaped.
🥄 You can eat me with a spoon.
🌱 I grow in warm climates.

plant.question: I am a plant that has sharp thorns and beautiful, fragrant flowers. What am I?

hints.text: 🌹 I am often given as a gift.
🥀 My thorns protect me from animals.
🌹 I can be many different colors.

plant.question: I am a grain that is used to make bread, pasta, and cereal. What am I?

hints.text: 🌾 I grow in fields.
🚜 Farmers harvest me.
🥖 I am a staple food in many countries.

plant.question: I am a very large flower that smells like rotting meat to attract pollinators. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I am found in Sumatra, Indonesia.
👃 My scent is very strong and unpleasant.
🌺 I am one of the largest individual flowers on Earth.
